title: STEM Education Promotion Process Using Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Goal: Enhancing STEM education effectiveness through collaborative learning environments based on CSCL and PLC. Conducting blended classes integrating asynchronous discussions, real-time collaboration tools, and expert feedback

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative STEM problem-solving using CSCL strategies on online platforms
Learners can establish a peer feedback and knowledge-sharing system by applying the Professional Learning Community (PLC) model
Learners can plan, execute, and present STEM project designs using digital tools (forums, wikis, video conferencing)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
